Name: InputQuestionReference
Description: Reference to a question used in the instruction. Allows the designation of an Alias used by the instruction. TypeOfObject should be set to QuestionItem or QuestionGrid.

Name: InputMeasurementReference
Description: Reference to a Measurement used in the instruction. Allows the designation of an Alias used by the instruction. TypeOfObject should be set to MeasurementItem.

Name: InputVariableReference
Description: Reference to a variable used in the coding process. Allows the designation of an Alias used by the instruction. TypeOfObject should be set to Variable.

Name: ExternalInformation
Description: Reference to an external source of information used in the coding process, for example a value from a chart, etc.

Name: CommandCode
Description: Structured information used by a system to process the instruction.

Name: ControlConstructReference
Description: A control construct which is used to describe or process the instruction.

Name: Aggregation
Description: Describes the aggregation process, identifying both the independent and dependent variables within the process.

Name: IsDerived
Description: Default setting is "true", the instruction describes a derivation. If the instruction is a simple recode, set to "false".
